description: This Java source file defines a REST controller named HelloController providing basic informational endpoints for the event management backend, including welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and application info endpoints.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic informational endpoints such as welcome message, documentation redirect, health status, and application info for the backend.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects clients to the Swagger UI page for API documentation.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple OK status indicating the application health.
